snippet: An inquiry concerning an evaluation of the Keystone XL pipeline proposal now includes lobbyists, who once held senior positions for Secretary of State Hillary Rodham and President Obama during their respective campaigns.
lead_paragraph: An inquiry concerning an evaluation of the Keystone XL pipeline proposal now includes lobbyists, who once held senior positions for Secretary of State Hillary Rodham and President Obama during their respective campaigns.

headline.main: Group Opposed to Pipeline Seeks More Documents on Lobbyists
